dict.acceptation: [May]五月；山楂属植物；（五朔节装饰用的）绿枝花枝；（春天开花的）绣线菊属植物；

sent.orig: He may come, or he may not.
sent.trans: 他也许会来，也许不会来。

sent.orig: He may or may not come tomorrow.
sent.trans: 明天他也兴来，也兴不来。

sent.orig: May your fortune be as boundless as the East Sea and may you live a long and happy life!
No one is so old but he may learn.[No one is so old that he may not learn.
On the grassland, it may be fine and sunny one moment, then almost immediately heavy wind and storm may come down on you like winking.
sent.trans: 在草原上， 一会儿晴空万里， 阳光灿烂， 但转瞬间，又会刮起狂风暴雨。
